Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Archer
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express, 28 Stony Island Temporary Southbound Reroute near Hyde Park/East End.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Lake.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
